events.name: Ukrainian President Zelensky's Visit to the United States
events.wd_label: Ukrainian President Zelensky's Visit to the United States
events.wd_description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky visited the United States, urging Congress to see aid to Ukraine as an investment in democracy and securing additional military support, including a Patriot air defense system.
events.description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky visited the United States, urging Congress to see aid to Ukraine as an investment in democracy and securing additional military support, including a Patriot air defense system.

events.name: Zelensky's Address to Congress
events.wd_description: During his visit to the United States, President Zelensky addressed Congress, emphasizing that aid to Ukraine is not charity but an investment in democracy and seeking continued support.
events.description: During his visit to the United States, President Zelensky addressed Congress, emphasizing that aid to Ukraine is not charity but an investment in democracy and seeking continued support.

events.name: New US Military Aid Package
events.wd_description: The United States announced an additional $1.85 billion in military aid to Ukraine, including a Patriot air defense system to bolster Ukraine's defense against Russian missiles.
events.description: The United States announced an additional $1.85 billion in military aid to Ukraine, including a Patriot air defense system to bolster Ukraine's defense against Russian missiles.

events.name: Concerns from US Republicans
events.wd_description: With Republicans set to take control of the House of Representatives, concerns have been raised about the cost of continued US assistance to Ukraine, which has totaled about $50 billion.
events.description: With Republicans set to take control of the House of Representatives, concerns have been raised about the cost of continued US assistance to Ukraine, which has totaled about $50 billion.

events.name: Shooting at Kurdish Cultural Centre in Paris
events.wd_label: Shooting at Kurdish Cultural Centre in Paris
events.wd_description: A gunman opened fire at a Kurdish Cultural Centre in central Paris, killing three people and wounding others, in what is suspected to be a far-right motivated attack.
events.description: A gunman opened fire at a Kurdish Cultural Centre in central Paris, killing three people and wounding others, in what is suspected to be a far-right motivated attack.

events.name: Shooting Incident
events.wd_description: A gunman targeted the Kurdish Cultural Centre in central Paris, killing three people and injuring others, with the attack appearing to be directed at the Kurdish community.
events.description: A gunman targeted the Kurdish Cultural Centre in central Paris, killing three people and injuring others, with the attack appearing to be directed at the Kurdish community.

events.name: Kurdish Democratic Council's Response
events.wd_description: The Kurdish Democratic Council condemned the attack and announced that a vigil would be held to pay tribute to those killed.
events.description: The Kurdish Democratic Council condemned the attack and announced that a vigil would be held to pay tribute to those killed.

events.name: Paris Mayor's Statement
events.wd_description: Paris Mayor Anne Hidalgo suggested that the attack was carried out by a far-right activist, expressing solidarity with the Kurdish community in Paris.
events.description: Paris Mayor Anne Hidalgo suggested that the attack was carried out by a far-right activist, expressing solidarity with the Kurdish community in Paris.

events.name: Murder Investigation
events.wd_description: Prosecutors in Paris have launched a murder investigation into the shooting, seeking to determine the motives and background of the attacker.
events.description: Prosecutors in Paris have launched a murder investigation into the shooting, seeking to determine the motives and background of the attacker.

events.name: Russia Rejects Peace Talks Amid Territorial Dispute
events.wd_label: Russia Rejects Peace Talks Amid Territorial Dispute
events.wd_description: Russia stated that peace talks would be complicated due to the West's refusal to recognize territories seized from Ukraine, following President Biden's indication of willingness to meet with Putin.
events.description: Russia stated that peace talks would be complicated due to the West's refusal to recognize territories seized from Ukraine, following President Biden's indication of willingness to meet with Putin.

events.name: Russia's Stance on Peace Talks
events.wd_description: Russia expressed openness to negotiations but rejected Western demands to withdraw from Ukraine, citing complications due to the West's refusal to recognize seized territories.
events.description: Russia expressed openness to negotiations but rejected Western demands to withdraw from Ukraine, citing complications due to the West's refusal to recognize seized territories.

events.name: Biden's Willingness to Negotiate
events.wd_description: President Biden expressed readiness to meet with Russian President Vladimir Putin if he was serious about ending the war in Ukraine.
events.description: President Biden expressed readiness to meet with Russian President Vladimir Putin if he was serious about ending the war in Ukraine.

events.name: Western Support for Ukraine
events.wd_description: During a meeting with French President Emmanuel Macron, Biden affirmed that they would not pressure Ukraine into any unacceptable compromises in peace talks.
events.description: During a meeting with French President Emmanuel Macron, Biden affirmed that they would not pressure Ukraine into any unacceptable compromises in peace talks.

events.name: Canada's Opportunity in the EV Battery Supply Chain
events.wd_label: Canada's Opportunity in the EV Battery Supply Chain
events.wd_description: Canada has the potential to become a key player in the EV battery supply chain due to its significant reserves of critical minerals and free trade partnership with the US, but it requires concerted action across public and private sectors.
events.description: Canada has the potential to become a key player in the EV battery supply chain due to its significant reserves of critical minerals and free trade partnership with the US, but it requires concerted action across public and private sectors.

events.name: Current Supply Chain Challenges
events.wd_description: The demand for critical minerals like cobalt, copper, and lithium is expected to outpace supply by 2030, exacerbated by the Inflation Reduction Act's content requirements for batteries and critical materials.
events.description: The demand for critical minerals like cobalt, copper, and lithium is expected to outpace supply by 2030, exacerbated by the Inflation Reduction Act's content requirements for batteries and critical materials.

events.name: Canada's Potential and Actions Needed
events.wd_description: Canada has the resources and expertise to expand mining and build advanced refining, processing, and production capabilities, but it needs a coordinated national strategy and immediate actions to streamline regulatory processes and encourage investment.
events.description: Canada has the resources and expertise to expand mining and build advanced refining, processing, and production capabilities, but it needs a coordinated national strategy and immediate actions to streamline regulatory processes and encourage investment.

events.name: Benefits of an Integrated Value Chain
events.wd_label: Benefits of an Integrated Value Chain
events.wd_description: An integrated EV battery ecosystem in Canada would generate more jobs, improve supply security, and attract ESG-minded investors, benefiting miners, refiners, and automotive OEMs.
events.description: An integrated EV battery ecosystem in Canada would generate more jobs, improve supply security, and attract ESG-minded investors, benefiting miners, refiners, and automotive OEMs.
